statements: SELECT * FROM TemperatureTrends WHERE location_id = 1
SELECT temperature, date FROM TemperatureTrends WHERE date='2022-01-01'
SELECT location_id, trend FROM TemperatureTrends WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT * FROM TemperatureTrends WHERE location_id = 2 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, location_id FROM TemperatureTrends GROUP BY location_id HAVING avg_temp > 25
SELECT * FROM TemperatureTrends ORDER BY date DESC, temperature ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_id, AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM TemperatureTrends GROUP BY location_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY average_temp DESC;
SELECT location_id, trend, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM TemperatureTrends WHERE temperature > 30 GROUP BY location_id, trend ORDER BY trend_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureTrends WHERE date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT location_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM TemperatureTrends GROUP BY location_id ORDER BY max_temp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Readings;
SELECT location, timestamp, temperature FROM Temperature_Readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, average_temperature FROM Climate_Data WHERE average_temperature > 25;
SELECT location, highest_temperature FROM Climate_Data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT data_id, location, lowest_temperature FROM Climate_Data ORDER BY lowest_temperature ASC;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM Temperature_Readings GROUP BY location HAVING MAX(temperature) > 30 ORDER BY max_temp DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM Climate_Data GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_readings DESC;
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY location ORDER BY avg_temp ASC;
SELECT location, average_temperature, highest_temperature, lowest_temperature FROM Climate_Data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data;
SELECT city, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT region_name, average_temperature FROM climate_regions ORDER BY average_temperature DESC;
SELECT city, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT region_name, predicted_temperature FROM climate_regions JOIN climate_change_predictions ON climate_regions.region_id = climate_change_predictions.region_id WHERE year = 2023;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT region_name, average_temperature FROM climate_regions WHERE latitude > 40
SELECT city, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY city DESC
SELECT region_name, predicted_temperature FROM climate_regions JOIN climate_change_predictions ON climate_regions.region_id = climate_change_predictions.region_id WHERE year = 2025
SELECT city, date, temperature FROM temperature_data ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM temperature_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location, date FROM temperature_data WHERE location='New York';
SELECT trend_description FROM temperature_trends ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT model_name, creation_date FROM prediction_models ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT location, trend_description FROM temperature_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT model_name, model_details FROM prediction_models WHERE creation_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT affected_area, change_description FROM climate_changes WHERE change_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY change_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Data;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, installation_date FROM Sensor ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT source_name, website_url FROM Data_Source WHERE source_type = 'API';
SELECT location_id, prediction_date, prediction_value FROM Climate_Predictions WHERE prediction_value > 0.5 ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Data WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, installation_date FROM Sensor WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity' ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT source_name, source_type, website_url FROM Data_Source WHERE website_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT location_id, AVG(prediction_value) FROM Climate_Predictions GROUP BY location_id;
